variable.name: shareid
variable.description: SHARE ID NUMBER

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: FRAMINGHAM COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: H010
variable.description: TAKE ASPIRIN REGULARLY?

variable.name: H011
variable.description: IF TAKING ASPIRIN, NUMBER OF ASPIRINS TAKEN REGULARLY

variable.name: H012
variable.description: IF TAKING ASPIRIN, FREQUENCY PER

variable.name: H013
variable.description: IF TAKING ASPIRIN, USUAL DOSE

variable.name: H018
variable.description: MEDICATION BOTTLES/PACKS USED BY EXAMINER TO RECORD MEDICATIONS?

variable.name: H024
variable.description: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM HAVE YOU TAKEN OR USED ORAL CONTRACEPTIVE PILLS, SHOTS, OR HORMONE IMPLANTS FOR BIRTH CONTROL OR MEDICAL INDICATIONS (NOT POST MENOPAUSAL HORMONE REPLACEMENT)?

variable.name: H060
variable.description: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM HAVE YOU SMOKED CIGARETTES REGULARLY? (NO MEANS LESS THAN 1 CIGARETTE A DAY FOR 1 YEAR)

variable.name: H061
variable.description: HAVE YOU SMOKED CIGARETTES REGULARLY IN THE LAST YEAR?
variable.value: NO OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H062
variable.description: DO YOU NOW SMOKE CIGARETTES (AS OF 1 MONTH AGO)?
variable.value: NO OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H063
variable.description: HOW MANY CIGARETTES DO YOU SMOKE PER DAY NOW?
variable.value: NONE, OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H064
variable.description: ON AVERAGE, SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM, HOW MANY CIGARETTES DID YOU SMOKE PER DAY?
variable.value: NONE, OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H065
variable.description: HOW OLD WERE YOU WHEN YOU FIRST STARTED REGULAR CIGARETTE SMOKING?
variable.value: HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H066
variable.description: IF YOU HAVE STOPPED SMOKING CIGARETTES COMPLETELY, HOW OLD WERE YOU WHEN YOU STOPPED?
variable.value: NOT STOPPED, OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H067
variable.description: DURING THE TIME YOU WERE SMOKING SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM, DID YOU EVER STOP SMOKING FOR > 6 MONTHS?
variable.value: NO, OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H068
variable.description: DURING THE TIME SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM, FOR HOW MANY YEARS IN TOTAL DID YOU STOP SMOKING CIGARETTES?
variable.value: NEVER STOPPED, OR HAS NOT SMOKED REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H069
variable.description: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM, HAVE YOU REGULARLY SMOKED A PIPE OR CIGAR?

variable.name: H070
variable.description: DO YOU SMOKE A PIPE OR CIGAR NOW?
variable.value: NO, OR HAS NOT SMOKED A PIPE OR CIGAR REGULARLY SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: H075
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK WINE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? - NUMBER OF 4 OZ. GLASSES OF WINE YOU DRINK PER WEEK OVER THE PAST YEAR
variable.comment: If wine use reported per week, then per month is missing. If wine use reported per month, then per week is missing. If no wine consumed, both week and month are zero.
variable.value: DOES NOT DRINK WINE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH
UNKNOWN OR # OF DRINKS IS REPORTED IN TERMS OF MONTHS

value.code: To calculate total alcohol consumption H072, H073,

variable.value: To calculate total alcohol consumption H072, H073, H075, H076, H078 and H079 must be taken together and units converted

variable.name: H071
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK BEER AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: H074
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK WINE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: H077
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK LIQUOR/SPIRITS AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: H072
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK BEER AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? - NUMBER OF BEER (12 OZ. BOTTLE, GLASS, CAN) YOU DRINK PER WEEK OVER THE PAST YEAR
variable.comment: If beer use reported per week, then per month is missing. If beer use reported per month, then per week is missing. If no beer consumed, both week and month are zero
variable.value: DOES NOT DRINK BEER AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH
UNKNOWN OR # OF DRINKS IS REPORTED IN TERMS OF MONTHS

value.code: To calculate total alcohol consumption H072, H073,

variable.value: To calculate total alcohol consumption H072, H073, H075, H076, H078 and H079 must be taken together and units converted

variable.name: H078
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK LIQUOR/SPIRITS AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? - NUMBER OF 1 1/4 OZ. JIGGERS OF LIQUOR/SPIRITS YOU DRINK PER WEEK OVER THE PAST YEAR
variable.comment: If liquor/spirits use reported per week, then per month is missing. If liquor/spirits use reported per month, then per week is missing. If no liquor/spirits consumed, both week and month are zero.
variable.value: DOES NOT DRINK LIQUOR AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH
UNKNOWN OR # OF DRINKS IS REPORTED IN TERMS OF MONTHS

value.code: To calculate total alcohol consumption H072, H073,

variable.value: To calculate total alcohol consumption H072, H073, H075, H076, H078 and H079 must be taken together and units converted

variable.name: H073
variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK BEER AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? - NUMBER OF BEER (12 OZ. BOTTLE, GLASS, CAN) YOU DRINK PER MONTH OVER THE PAST YEAR
variable.comment: If beer use reported per week, then per month is missing. If beer use reported per month, then per week is missing. If no beer consumed, both week and month are zero.

UNKNOWN OR # OF DRINKS IS REPORTED IN TERMS OF WEEKS

variable.comment: If wine use reported per week, then per month is missing. If wine use reported per month, then per week is missing. If no wine consumed, both week and month are zero.

UNKNOWN OR # OF DRINKS IS REPORTED IN TERMS OF WEEKS

variable.description: IN THE INTERIM, DID YOU DRINK LIQUOR/SPIRITS AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? - NUMBER OF 1 1/4 OZ. JIGGERS OF LIQUOR/SPIRITS YOU DRINK PER MONTH OVER THE PAST YEAR
variable.comment: If liquor/spirits use reported per week, than per month is missing. If liquor/spirits use reported per month, than per week is missing. If no liquor/spirits consumed, both week and month are zero.

variable.name: H080
variable.description: AT WHAT AGE DID YOU STOP DRINKING ALCOHOL?

variable.name: H081
variable.description: OVER THE PAST YEAR, ON AVERAGE ON HOW MANY DAYS PER WEEK DID YOU DRINK AN ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGE OF ANY TYPE?

variable.name: H082
variable.description: OVER THE PAST YEAR, ON A TYPICAL DAY WHEN YOU DRINK, HOW MANY DRINKS DO YOU HAVE?

variable.name: H083
variable.description: WHAT WAS THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF DRINKS YOU HAD IN 24 HOUR PERIOD DURING THE PAST MONTH?

variable.name: H084
variable.description: HAS THERE EVER BEEN A TIME IN YOUR LIFE WHEN YOU DRANK 5 OR MORE ALCOHOLIC DRINKS OF ANY KIND ALMOST DAILY?

variable.name: H085
variable.description: DO YOU USUALLY HAVE A COUGH? (EXCLUDE CLEARING OF THE THROAT)

variable.description: IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BEEN AWAKENED BY SHORTNESS OF BREATH?

variable.description: IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BEEN AWAKENED BY A WHEEZING/WHISTLING IN YOUR CHEST?

variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT WHEN QUIET OR RESTING?

variable.name: H393
variable.description: WEIGHT (TO NEAREST POUND)

variable.name: H394
variable.description: PROTOCOL MODIFICATION FOR WEIGHT
variable.comment: If weight was obtained and protocol modification was blank, then protocol modification was changed to no.

variable.name: H399
variable.description: HEIGHT (INCHES, TO NEXT LOWER 1/4 INCH)

variable.name: H400
variable.description: PROTOCOL MODIFICATION FOR HEIGHT
variable.comment: If height was obtained and protocol modification was blank, then protocol modification was changed to no.

variable.name: H395
variable.description: METHOD USED TO OBTAIN WEIGHT
variable.value: FHS PROTOCOL/FIELD VISIT WITH PORTABLE SCALE

variable.name: H401
variable.description: IN THE PAST YEAR HAVE YOU LOST MORE THAN 10 POUNDS?
variable.value: YES, UNINTENTIONALLY, NOT DUE TO DIETING OR EXERCISE
YES, INTENTIONALLY, DUE TO DIETING OR EXERCISE

variable.name: H403
variable.description: WAIST GIRTH AT UMBILICUS (INCHES, TO NEXT LOWER 1/4 INCH)

variable.name: H405
variable.description: WAIST GIRT AT ILIAC CREST (INCHES, TO NEXT LOWER 1/4 INCH

variable.name: H407
variable.description: SAGITTAL ABDOMINAL DIAMETER (TO NEAREST 0.1 CM)

variable.name: H404
variable.description: PROTOCOL MODIFICATION FOR WAIST GIRTH AT UMBILICUS
variable.comment: If waist girth at umbilicus was obtained and protocol modification was blank, then protocol modification was changed to no.

variable.name: H406
variable.description: PROTOCOL MODIFICATION FOR WAIST GIRTH AT ILIAC CREST
variable.comment: If waist girth at iliac crest was obtained and protocol modification was blank, then protocol modification was changed to no.

variable.name: H408
variable.description: PROTOCOL MODIFICATION FOR SAGITTAL ABDOMINAL DIAMETER
variable.comment: If sagittal abdominal diameter was obtained and protocol modification was blank, then protocol modification was changed to no.

variable.name: H460
variable.description: DOES ANYONE LIVE WITH YOU?

variable.name: H461
variable.description: DOES ANYONE LIVE WITH YOU? - SPOUSE
variable.value: YES, LESS THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR
YES, MORE THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR

variable.name: H462
variable.description: DOES ANYONE LIVE WITH YOU? - SIGNIFICANT OTHER
variable.value: YES, LESS THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR
YES, MORE THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR

variable.name: H463
variable.description: DOES ANYONE LIVE WITH YOU? - CHILDREN
variable.value: YES, LESS THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR
YES, MORE THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR

variable.name: H464
variable.description: DOES ANYONE LIVE WITH YOU? - FRIENDS
variable.value: YES, LESS THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR
YES, MORE THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR

variable.name: H465
variable.description: DOES ANYONE LIVE WITH YOU? - RELATIVES
variable.value: YES, LESS THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR
YES, MORE THAN 3 MONTHS PER YEAR

variable.name: H468
variable.description: ARE YOU ABLE TO DO HEAVY WORK AROUND THE HOUSE, LIKE SHOVELING SNOW OR WASHING WINDOWS, WALLS, OR FLOORS WITHOUT HELP?

variable.name: H469
variable.description: ARE YOU ABLE TO WALK HALF A MILE WITHOUT HELP? (ABOUT 4-6 BLOCKS)

variable.name: H470
variable.description: ARE YOU ABLE TO WALK UP AND DOWN ONE FLIGHT OF STAIRS WITHOUT HELP?

variable.name: H471
variable.description: DURING THE PAST WEEK, I FELT THAT EVERYTHING I DID WAS AN EFFORT
variable.value: RARELY OR NONE OF THE TIME (LESS THAN 1 DAY)
SOME OR A LITTLE OF THE TIME (1-2 DAYS)
OCCASIONALLY OR MODERATE AMOUNT OF TIME (3-4 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.name: H472
variable.description: DURING THE PAST WEEK, I COULD NOT "GET GOING"
variable.value: RARELY OR NONE OF THE TIME (LESS THAN 1 DAY)
SOME OR A LITTLE OF THE TIME (1-2 DAYS)
OCCASIONALLY OR MODERATE AMOUNT OF TIME (3-4 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.name: H474
variable.description: CAN YOU GET DRESSED (UNDRESSING REDRESSING) INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (SUCH AS VELCRO, ELASTIC LACES)?
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: H475
variable.description: CAN YOU BATHE (INCLUDING GETTING IN AND OUT OF THE TUB/SHOWER) INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR USE OF A DEVICE (BATH CHAIR, LONG HANDLED SPONGE, HAND HELD SHOWER, SAFETY BARS)?
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: H476
variable.description: CAN YOU EAT INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (SUCH AS ROCKING KNIFE, SPORK, LONG STRAW, PLATE GUARD)?
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: H478
variable.description: CAN YOU DO TOILETING ACTIVITIES (USING BATHROOM FACILITIES AND HANDLE CLOTHING) INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (SUCH AS, SPECIAL TOILET SEAT, COMMODE)?
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: H477
variable.description: CAN YOU TRANSFER (GETTING IN AND OUT OF A CHAIR) INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (SUCH AS, SLIDING BOARD, GRAB BARS, SPECIAL SEAT)?
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: H480
variable.description: SLEEP - NUMBER OF HOURS THAT YOU TYPICALLY SLEEP
variable.comment: If sum of hours of H480-H484 were less than 22 or more than 26, H480 was kept as is and H481-H484 were set to missing.

variable.name: H481
variable.description: SEDENTARY - NUMBER OF HOURS TYPICALLY SITTING?
variable.comment: If sum of hours of H480-H484 were less than 22 or more than 26, H480 was kept as is and H481-H484 were set to missing.

variable.name: H482
variable.description: SLIGHT ACTIVITY - NUMBER OF HOURS WITH ACTIVITIES SUCH AS STANDING, WALKING?
variable.comment: If sum of hours of H480-H484 were less than 22 or more than 26, H480 was kept as is and H481-H484 were set to missing.

variable.name: H483
variable.description: MODERATE ACTIVITY - NUMBER OF HOURS WITH ACTIVITIES SUCH AS HOUSEWORK (VACUUM, DUST, YARD CHORES, CLIMBING STAIRS, LIGHT SPORTS SUCH AS BOWLING, GOLF)?
variable.comment: If sum of hours of H480-H484 were less than 22 or more than 26, H480 was kept as is and H481-H484 were set to missing.

variable.name: H484
variable.description: HEAVY ACTIVITY - NUMBER OF HOURS WITH ACTIVITIES SUCH AS HEAVY HOUSEHOLD WORK, HEAVY YARD WORK SUCH AS STACKING OR CHOPPING WOOD, EXERCISE SUCH AS INTENSIVE SPORTS - JOGGING, SWIMMING, ETC.)?
variable.comment: If sum of hours of H480-H484 were less than 22 or more than 26, H480 was kept as is and H481-H484 were set to missing.

variable.name: H485
variable.description: WHAT IS YOUR NORMAL WALKING PACE OUTDOORS?
variable.value: EASY, CASUAL SLOW (LESS THAN 2 MILES PER HOUR)
NORMAL, AVERAGE (2 TO 2.9 MILES PER HOUR)
BRISK PACE (3 TO 3.9 MILES PER HOUR)
VERY BRISK PACE (4 TO 4.9 MILES PER HOUR)

variable.name: H486
variable.description: HOW MANY FLIGHTS OF STAIRS (NOT STEPS) DO YOU CLIMB DAILY? (10 STAIRS PER FLIGHT)

variable.name: H670
variable.description: DO YOU TAKE INHALERS OR BRONCHODILATORS?

variable.name: H671
variable.description: DO YOU USE ANY OF THESE MEDICATIONS - ALBUTEROL, PROVENTIL, VENTOLIN, COMBIVENT, MAXAIR, VOLMAX, XOPENEX, BRONKOOMETER, PIRBUTEROL, LEVALBUTEROL, OR METAPROTERENOL?
variable.value: NO, OR DOES NOT USE INHALERS OR BRONCHODILATORS

variable.name: H672
variable.description: HOW MANY HOURS AGO DID YOU LAST USE THE MEDICATION, EITHER BY INHALER OR NEBULIZER?
variable.value: DOES NOT USE ANY MEDICATIONS LISTED IN H670

variable.name: H673
variable.description: DO YOU TAKE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING INHALERS? SEREVENT, ADVAIR, FORADIL, SALMETEROL, OR FORMOTEROL
variable.value: NO, OR DOES NOT USE INHALERS OR BRONCHODILATORS

variable.name: H674
variable.description: HOW MANY HOURS AGO DID YOU LAST USE THE MEDICATION?
variable.value: DOES NOT USE ANY OF THE MEDICATIONS LISTED IN H673

variable.name: H675
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR ANIMALS, SUCH AS CATS, DOGS, OR HORSES, NEAR FEATHERS, INCLUDING PILLOWS, QUILTS, OR IN A DUSTY OR MOLDY PART OF THE HOUSE, DO YOU EVER START TO COUGH?

variable.name: H676
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR ANIMALS, SUCH AS CATS, DOGS, OR HORSES, NEAR FEATHERS, INCLUDING PILLOWS, QUILTS, OR IN A DUSTY OR MOLDY PART OF THE HOUSE, DO YOU EVER START TO WHEEZE?

variable.name: H677
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR ANIMALS, SUCH AS CATS, DOGS, OR HORSES, NEAR FEATHERS, INCLUDING PILLOWS, QUILTS, OR IN A DUSTY OR MOLDY PART OF THE HOUSE, DO YOU EVER GET A FEELING OF TIGHTNESS IN YOUR CHEST?

variable.name: H678
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR ANIMALS, SUCH AS CATS, DOGS, OR HORSES, NEAR FEATHERS, INCLUDING PILLOWS, QUILTS, OR IN A DUSTY OR MOLDY PART OF THE HOUSE, DO YOU EVER START TO FEEL SHORT OF BREATH?

variable.name: H679
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR ANIMALS, SUCH AS CATS, DOGS, OR HORSES, NEAR FEATHERS, INCLUDING PILLOWS, QUILTS,OR IN A DUSTY OR MOLDY PART OF THE HOUSE,DO YOUEVER GET A RUNNY OR STUFFY NOSE OR START TO SNEEZE?

variable.name: H680
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR ANIMALS, SUCH AS CATS, DOGS, OR HORSES, NEAR FEATHERS,INCLUDING PILLOWS, QUILTS, OR IN A DUSTY OR MOLDY PART OF THE HOUSE, DO YOU EVER GET ITCHING OR WATERING EYES?

variable.name: H681
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR TREES, GRASS, OR FLOWERS, OR WHEN THERE IS A LOT OF POLLEN IN THE AIR, DO YOU EVER START TO COUGH?

variable.name: H682
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR TREES, GRASS, OR FLOWERS, OR WHEN THERE IS A LOT OF POLLEN IN THE AIR, DO YOU EVER START TO WHEEZE?

variable.name: H683
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR TREES, GRASS, OR FLOWERS, OR WHEN THERE IS A LOT OF POLLEN IN THE AIR, DO YOU EVER GET A FEELING OF TIGHTNESS IN YOUR CHEST?

variable.name: H684
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR TREES, GRASS, OR FLOWERS, OR WHEN THERE IS A LOT OF POLLEN IN THE AIR, DO YOU EVER START TO FEEL SHORT OF BREATH?

variable.name: H685
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR TREES, GRASS, OR FLOWERS, OR WHEN THERE IS A LOT OF POLLEN IN THE AIR, DO YOU EVER START TO GET A RUNNY OR STUFFY NOSE OR START TO SNEEZE?

variable.name: H686
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE NEAR TREES, GRASS, OR FLOWERS, OR WHEN THERE IS A LOT OF POLLEN IN THE AIR, DO YOU EVER GET ITCHING OR WATERING EYES?

variable.name: H687
variable.description: DO YOU CURRENTLY HAVE A CAT, DOG, OR OTHER FURRY PETS LIVING IN YOUR HOME?

variable.name: H699
variable.description: WHAT IS YOUR CURRENT MARITAL STATUS?
variable.value: MARRIED/LIVING AS MARRIED/ LIVING WITH PARTNER

variable.name: H702
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - RACE CAUCASIAN OR WHITE
variable.comment: When looking at race, look at H702 through H707.

variable.name: H703
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - RACE AFRICAN AMERICAN OR BLACK
variable.comment: When looking at race, look at H702 through H707.

variable.name: H704
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - RACE ASIAN
variable.comment: When looking at race, look at H702 through H707.

variable.name: H705
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - RACE NATIVE HAWAIIAN OR OTHER PACIFIC ISLANDER
variable.comment: When looking at race, look at H702 through H707.

variable.name: H706
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - RACE AMERICAN INDIAN OR ALASKA NATIVE
variable.comment: When looking at race, look at H702 through H707.

variable.name: H708
variable.description: WHAT IS THE HIGHEST DEGREE OR LEVEL OF SCHOOL YOU HAVE COMPLETED (IF CURRENTLY ENROLLED, MARK HIGHEST GRADE COMPLETED, DEGREE RECEIVED)
variable.value: COMPLETED HIGH SCHOOL (12TH GRADE) OR GED
GRADUATE OR PROFESSIONAL DEGREE (MASTER'S, DOCTORATE, MD, ETC.)
PREFER NOT TO ANSWER OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: H709
variable.description: PLEASE CHOOSE WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT EMPLOYMENT STATUS
variable.value: HOMEMAKER, NOT WORKING OUTSIDE THE HOME
EMPLOYED, BUT ON LEAVE FOR HEALTH REASONS
EMPLOYED, BUT TEMPORARILY AWAY FROM MY JOB
UNEMPLOYED OR LAID OFF OR FULL-TIME STUDENT
RETIRED FROM MY USUAL OCCUPATION AND NOT WORKING
RETIRED FROM MY USUAL OCCUPATION BUT WORKING FOR PAY
RETIRED FROM MY USUAL OCCUPATION BUT VOLUNTEERING
PREFER NOT TO ANSWER OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: H707
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - RACE PREFER NOT TO ANSWER
variable.comment: When looking at race, look at H702 through H707.

variable.name: H700
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - ETHNICITY HISPANIC OR LATINO
variable.comment: When looking at ethnicity, look at both H700 and H701. Many participants but No for both variables, use with caution.

variable.name: H701
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOU - ETHNICITY NOT HISPANIC OR LATINO
variable.comment: When looking at ethnicity, look at both H700 and H701. Many participants but No for both variables, use with caution.

variable.name: H710
variable.description: WHAT IS YOUR CURRENT OCCUPATION (WRITE IN)
variable.comment: Current occupation written in by participant, this variable was not cleaned for consistent spellings across occupations.

variable.name: H711
variable.description: USING THE OCCUPATION CODING SHEET CHOOSE THE CODE THAT BEST DESCRIBES YOUR OCCUPATION
variable.comment: H711 modified - to preserve confidentiality - some groups put together to avoid small cells.
variable.value: PSYCHOLOGIST / SOCIAL WORKER / MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELOR
SKILLED LABOR (E.G. PLUMBER, CARPENTER, PAINTER, HAIRDRESSER)
GENERAL LABOR (E.G. CUSTODIAN, DELIVERY, MAILMAN, TRUCKDRIVER)

variable.name: H714
variable.description: IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOUR HEALTH IS?

variable.name: H715
variable.description: DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN MODERATE ACTIVITIES, SUCH AS MOVING A TABLE, PUSHING A VACUUM CLEANER, BOWLING OR PLAYING GOLF?

variable.name: H716
variable.description: DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN CLIMBING SEVERAL FLIGHTS OF STAIRS?

variable.name: H717
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU ACCOMPLISHED LESS THAN YOU WOULD LIKE AS A RESULT OF YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH?

variable.name: H718
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, WERE YOU LIMITED IN THE KIND OF WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH?

variable.name: H719
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU ACCOMPLISHED LESS THAN YOU WOULD LIKE AS A RESULT OF ANY EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS (SUCH AS FEELING DEPRESSED OR ANXIOUS)?

variable.name: H720
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, DID YOU NOT DO WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITIES AS CAREFULLY AS USUAL AS A RESULT OF ANY EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS (SUCH AS FEELING DEPRESSED OR ANXIOUS)?

variable.name: H721
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HOW MUCH DID PAIN INTERFERE WITH YOUR NORMAL WORK (INCLUDING BOTH WORK OUTSIDE THE HOME AND HOUSEWORK)?

variable.name: H722
variable.description: HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS HAVE YOU FELT CALM AND PEACEFUL?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: H723
variable.description: HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS DID YOU HAVE A LOT OF ENERGY?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: H724
variable.description: HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS HAVE YOU FELT DOWNHEARTED AND BLUE?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: H725
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS HOW MUCH OF THE TIME HAS YOUR PHYSICAL OR EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS INTERFERED WITH YOUR SOCIAL ACTIVITIES (LIKE VISITING FRIENDS, RELATIVES, ETC.)

variable.name: H726
variable.description: HOW MUCH SLEEP DO YOU USUALLY GET AT NIGHT (OR YOUR MAIN SLEEP PERIOD) ON WEEKDAYS OR WORK DAYS (NUMBER OF HOURS)
variable.comment: There are some high numbers for this variable. Participants may have misunderstood how to answer the question. Use with caution.

variable.name: H727
variable.description: HOW LONG DOES IT USUALLY TAKE YOU TO FALL ASLEEP AT BEDTIME (NUMBER OF HOURS)
variable.comment: There are some high numbers for this variable. Participants may have misunderstood how to answer the question. Use with caution.

variable.name: H728
variable.description: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW OFTEN DO YOU SNORE WHILE YOU ARE SLEEPING?

variable.name: H729
variable.description: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW OFTEN DO YOU SNORT, GASP, OR STOP BREATHING WHILE YOU ARE ASLEEP?

variable.name: H730
variable.description: HOW OFTEN IN THE PAST MONTH HAVE YOU HAD TROUBLE FALLING ASLEEP?

variable.name: H731
variable.description: HOW OFTEN IN THE PAST MONTH HAVE YOU AWAKENED DURING THE NIGHT AND HAD TROUBLE GETTING BACK TO SLEEP?

variable.name: H732
variable.description: HOW OFTEN IN THE PAST MONTH HAVE YOU AWAKENED TOO EARLY IN THE MORNING AND BEEN UNABLE TO GET BACK TO SLEEP?

variable.name: H733
variable.description: HOW OFTEN IN THE PAST MONTH HAVE YOU FELT EXCESSIVELY (OR OVERLY) SLEEPY DURING THE DAY?

variable.name: H734
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") SITTING AND READING?

variable.name: H735
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") WATCHING TV?

variable.name: H736
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") SITTING INACTIVE IN A PUBLIC PLACE (SUCH AS THEATER OR A MEETING)?

variable.name: H737
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") RIDING AS A PASSENGER IN A CAR FOR AN HOUR WITHOUT A BREAK?

variable.name: H738
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") LYING DOWN TO REST IN THE AFTERNOON WHEN CIRCUMSTANCES PERMIT?

variable.name: H739
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") SITTING AND TALKING TO SOMEONE?

variable.name: H740
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") SITTING QUIETLY AFTER A LUNCH WITHOUT ALCOHOL?

variable.name: H741
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") IN A CAR, WHILE STOPPED IN TRAFFIC FOR A FEW MINUTES?

variable.name: H742
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") AT THE DINNER TABLE?

variable.name: H743
variable.description: WHAT IS THE CHANCE THAT YOU WOULD DOZE OFF OR FALL ASLEEP (NOT JUST "FEEL TIRED") WHILE DRIVING?

variable.name: H744
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TOLD BY A DOCTOR OR OTHER HEALTH PROFESSIONAL THAT YOU HAVE SLEEP APNEA?

variable.name: H745
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TOLD BY A DOCTOR OR OTHER HEALTH PROFESSIONAL THAT YOU HAVE INSOMNIA?

variable.name: H746
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TOLD BY A DOCTOR OR OTHER HEALTH PROFESSIONAL THAT YOU HAVE RESTLESS LEGS?
